title: 215: Learning in Wartime
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In 1939, C.S. Lewis gave a sermon to some Oxford boys about whether it's okay to study books when there are Nazis to fight.
itunes:author: 3 potential soldiers
itunes:subtitle: and tickle fights!
